title: Season 2024 League of Legends Cinematic Out Now!
content: Past, present, and possible futures—we remember them all. Season 2024 is now live. How will you fight for tomorrow? Song featuring Forts, Tiffany Aris, and 2WEI. The video showcases Yasuo as an elderly man, leading to speculation on its symbolic significance. Tryndamere’s encounter with Kindred has stirred a flurry of theories about its possible previous occurrences. There’s robust discussion regarding the underlying meaning behind Tryndamere’s tenacity in combat against death itself.

title: How the LoL ranking system and rewards work
content: Earn League Points (LP) by winning ranked matches to climb the ladder in League of Legends. You can start playing ranked matches when you reach level 30 in LoL. There are two ways to rank up in League of Legends – solo/duo queues and flex queues. The former lets you go solo or with another player in the queue. This makes it harder to communicate as you’ll be paired with strangers. As for flex queue, you can bring your friends along for the ride, even if they’re on different ranks. The game will automatically pick opponents that will balance out these differences.
